marker.comment: Toujours a Marina Hemingway CHAUD. Still at Marina Hemingway HOT
Rita nous juste effleuré. Rita just missed us
Tarara et sa playa. Tarara and it`s playa, snorkeling and mohitos
Toujours a Tarara , loin des tempetes. Still in Tarara , and safe from storms.;
Tarara, Wilma nous menace un peu. Wilma is a little menacing. No worries;
